Uses of Interface
com.soa.message.Message

  • Packages that use Message 
    Package Description
    com.soa.activity  
    com.soa.message
    The message package supplies an abstraction of a message.
    com.soa.message.handler  
    com.soa.soap.message  

    • Uses of Message in com.soa.activity

      Methods in com.soa.activity that return Message 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Message ActivityContext.getMessage()
      Returns the message that is the subject of the activity.
      Methods in com.soa.activity with parameters of type Message 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ActivityContext.setFault(Message fault)
      Changes the fault message returned by an activity (if any).

      Abstract implementation of Message interface that can be easily extended for specific implementations.

      Simple implementation of the Message interface.
